TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(object sender, StructureChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StructureChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StructureChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StructureChangedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: 代表由用戶端應用程式實作的方法，以處理當使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄變更時所引發的事件。

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the client application to handle the event raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的資訊不同的結構變更的委派所接收的事件。The following table describes the information in the event received by the delegate for different structure changes. |`e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| ||已加入子系。The child that was added.|已加入子系。The child that was added.| ||已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the child that was removed.|已移除的子系。The child that was removed.| ||已加入之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.|已加入之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.| ||已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.|已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.| ||無效的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were invalidated.|無效的子系的父代The parent of the children that were invalidated|
